editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Psalter. F. iv r: record of the purchase of several books, written in a less well-trained hand: the Dawit for 12 birr and for 8 birr the Qeddase, and for 7 birr Collection of Paul's writings (Pawlos), and Sa'atat. For 5 birr, a covering of the head. For 3 birr Sword of Divinity, as well as additional items, i.e., a purchase of grain (ቁና). The midpoint of the Psalms is not marked. Psalm 151 is the short version. Common version of the Song of Songs. The Praises of Mary begin with Monday. , col. 1, lower and col. 2: Record: A genaeology of one በዥሮንድ (finance minister of the king) ተክሉ ልጅ አመተ ድንግል. r, col. 1: Record: a genaeology of one አካሎ አኖሬን ይወልዳል. , col. 2-151r: a genaeology of the "Four Chairs" (፬ቱ ወ[ን]በሮች)፡ ትዋጋ ለጽዮን, ሰመረ ለጽዮን, ሠገደ በጽዮን, and አመነ በጽዮን ናችው. The record contains names common to Tigray. F-152r, top: Record: a genaeology of a family, incomplete at the beginning. , lower: Record of a precious gift given by አበ አዩኤል to መም[ህ]ር ወረቴ. , top (both columns): Record: Genealogy of a family. , bottom (two columns): Asmat prayer for protection from snake. : Record: Genealogy of one ጽላት ግን ወረርን ይወልዳል.
